page.title: 02 Village Life 1985
page.content: In the village there are two shops and one post office.There are no private schools,but there is a primary school in the High Street. There is a little stream which runs though the middle of the village.There are no houses for old aged pensioners to go to when they are too old to look after themselves .They have a doctor but not a dentist.A fish and chips van comes round during the week There is no market,the nearest being in Northampton 8 miles away where the villagers have to do their main shopping.They have a garage and petrol station,but there is no bank or building society. There is a village football team and there is a park near the shops.
